meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4116.

td.p: Peter Paniccia, a bartender from Columbus, Ohio
Maria Harrigan, an attorney from Chicago, Illinois
Eric Floyd, a college student from Calhoun, Georgia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $55,200)

tr.td: HISTORIC NICKNAMES
HAIL TO THE K.C. CHIEF
GIVE 'EM A HAND
GERMAN CITIES
DISASTER DIGEST
GARDEN TALK
